The views, opinions and/or findings contained in this report are those of the author(s) and should not be construed as an official Department of the Army or Navy position, policy or decision unless so designated by other documentation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"6d258","text":"OBJECTIVE","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eor1q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"72f4l","text":"To outline steps for properly storing field-collected soil samples and nucleic acid samples purified from these soil.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5v73","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbq72","text":"SUMMARY/SCOPE","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dguj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ad1v","text":"The overarching aim of the REDI-NET is to develop a collaborative laboratory network between domestic and international partnering institutions to address disease surveillance needs in order to effectively detect, predict and contain potentially emergent zoonosis. This SOP provides guidance on storage of soil samples and their purified nucleic acid to preserve their integrity for downstream nucleic acid extraction and/or sequencing library preparation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cg7oi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"414c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7528t","text":"MAINTENANCE OF EQUIPMENT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"q1u4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"81k6n","text":"Decontaminate a PCR workstation by keeping the UV light on for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":63,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4elp6","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2moos","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eoqte","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"A24C9C601FDC11EE882677F57D1AC721","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
keywords: STORAGE PROCEDURE FOR UNTREATED SAMPLE,STORAGE PROCEDURE FOR TOTAL NUCLEIC ACID

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1s61r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bfhkt","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c8uik","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8dj86","text":"Cool 96-well microfuge tube racks  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"2mk8","text":"NOTES: ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":142}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1nvls","text":"Collected soil samples need to be kept on a cold chain at all times to prevent RNA degradation. The following procedure will apply only where   storage is feasible.","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":3},{"key":2,"length":1,"offset":70},{"key":3,"length":1,"offset":304}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7nos3","text":"If   storage is not possible, temporarily store the soil samples in a   freezer and follow soil sample processing SOP (REDI-NET SOP S-2 Soil Processing) as soon as possible for total nucleic acid extraction. Subsequently, use a portion of the total nucleic acid and reverse- transcribe RNA into cDNA for   storage. To do this, follow the initial steps of the soil sample testing SOP (REDI-NET SOP S-4 Soil Testing) cDNA Synthesis until finishing step 40.","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0F23E8001FE411EE882677F57D1AC721","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"},"1":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0D5235401FE411EE882677F57D1AC721","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"},"2":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1162B4701FE411EE882677F57D1AC721","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"},"3":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"142B98701FE411EE882677F57D1AC721","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"}}}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C540BD701FDA11EE882677F57D1AC721","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"77mu8","text":"Each collected soil sample will be transferred to a 50 mL falcon tube with a unique sample ID. Put falcon tubes into cryo/freezer box.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"25hn0","text":"Close the box tightly, secure with clear Saran wrap and immediately transfer to   freezer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":80,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"51v23","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"esii","text":"Update the freezer inventory so that samples can be tracked properly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aodvu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2rnnc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8leoj","text":"In the clean PCR workstation, carefully transfer the eluted total nucleic acid to a 96-well PCR microplate, make sure to keep samples in the exact same locations corresponding to the rack where the original ticks were stored.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5me63","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cdkds","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"43c32","text":"NOTES: ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"961j4","text":"The following procedure is to properly store total nucleic acid extracted from soil samples (including negative controls) using the KingFisher nucleic acid purification system. The eluted total nucleic acid will be in either 96-well microplate (Flex model) or elution strip (Duo Prime model).","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":43}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5s9km","text":"Total nucleic acid samples need to be kept   all the time to minimize RNA degradation.","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"420A74501FE411EE882677F57D1AC721","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"}}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":9,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"f3ckc","text":"IMPORTANT: Mark the “A1” position of the 96-well microplate to prevent any mistakes on plate orientation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3eo31","text":"Cover the 96-well PCR microplate with adhesive film to prevent spill over or contamination.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ab7h0","text":"Label the film with a unique plate ID.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b45v0","text":"Update the freezer inventory so that samples can be tracked properly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: S-3 SOIL STORAGE
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"1ht02","text":"RISKS AND PERSONAL PROTECTION:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9s5cs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cfo6m","text":"Gloves should be worn all the time when handling samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
